DOC.brief_summary: Without therapy HLH is often fatal, and often rapidly fatal. The treatment protocol HLH-94 has improved survival markedly as compared to the survival earlier. We now aim to improve survival further.
DOC.detailed_description: The most dangerous period after HLH diagnosis is the first 2 months. In HLH-2004 we provide additional therapy during this period as compared to in HLH-94.
DOC.criteria: Patients who fulfil the diagnostic criteria of HLH. Prior cytotoxic or cyclosporin treatment for HLH.
